questions.question: What is the primary goal of tokenization in NLP?
options: To convert text into a numerical format usable by computers
To identify the grammatical structure of sentences
To analyze the sentiment expressed in text
questions.correct_answer: To convert text into a numerical format usable by computers

questions.question: What is a significant limitation of word-based tokenization?
options: It handles misspellings and new words effectively.
It results in very small vocabularies.
It can lead to 'out of vocabulary' errors for unseen words.
questions.correct_answer: It can lead to 'out of vocabulary' errors for unseen words.

questions.question: Which tokenization method offers the best balance between vocabulary size and flexibility, according to the text?
What is a potential drawback of character-based tokenization?
options: It preserves the meaning of words exceptionally well.
It results in extremely long sequences.
questions.correct_answer: It results in extremely long sequences.
